txt.en: You have secured the siege schematics
You have defeated the assault upon the store-houses
'Siege Schematics? I'll make sure they are secured.'
'When the time comes to strike back, these schematics will prove valuable.'
'It is important to keep our plans from the enemy.'

The invading army has overrun the wall and is attempting to raid and pillage the various resources found within the Deep. The store-houses and stockpiles of supplies must be protected from the vandals. The Rohirrim Siege schematics remaining in the coomb must be carried to a secure location, or they risk falling into the enemy's hands.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Partial</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Supply crate is destroyed
* Store-house is destroyed

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Store-house guard is defeated
 
<rgb=#00FF00>Major Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Schematics are delivered to the water-mill
* Supplies protected from all enemy waves
* Store-houses protected from all enemy waves
<rgb=#FF0000>The enemy has taken the siege schematics</rgb>

The equipment store-houses and stockpiles of supplies must be secured before the invading army can destroy them. Schematics can be picked up and stored at the water-mill. The larger provisions must be defended from direct attacks.
<rgb=#FF0000>The enemy has destroyed a crate of supplies</rgb>
Defend the supplies and store-houses from waves of enemies ([placeholder]/7)
Do not allow the guards to be defeated ([placeholder]/3)
